verses.verse: The word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me again, saying, <S%H559><s%>

What <S%H4100><s%> mean ye, that ye <S%H859><s%> use <S%H4911><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> <S%H853><s%> proverb <S%H4912><s%> concerning <S%H5921><s%> the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> The fathers <S%H1><s%> have eaten <S%H398><s%> sour grapes, <S%H1155><s%> and the children's <S%H1121><s%> teeth <S%H8127><s%> are set on edge? <S%H6949><s%>

As I <S%H589><s%> live, <S%H2416><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD, <S%H3069><s%> ye shall not <S%H518><s%> have <S%H1961><s%> occasion any more <S%H5750><s%> to use <S%H4911><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> proverb <S%H4912><s%> in Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

Behold, <S%H2005><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> souls <S%H5315><s%> are mine; as the soul <S%H5315><s%> of the father, <S%H1><s%> so also the soul <S%H5315><s%> of the son <S%H1121><s%> is mine: the soul <S%H5315><s%> that sinneth, <S%H2398><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> shall die. <S%H4191><s%>
But if <S%H3588><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> be <S%H1961><s%> just, <S%H6662><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> that which is lawful <S%H4941><s%> and right, <S%H6666><s%>

And hath not <S%H3808><s%> eaten <S%H398><s%> upon <S%H413><s%> the mountains, <S%H2022><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> hath lifted up <S%H5375><s%> his eyes <S%H5869><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the idols <S%H1544><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> hath defiled <S%H2930><s%> his neighbor's <S%H7453><s%> wife, <S%H802><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> hath come near <S%H7126><s%> to <S%H413><s%> a menstruous <S%H5079><s%> woman, <S%H802><s%>

And hath not <S%H3808><s%> oppressed <S%H3238><s%> any, <S%H376><s%> but hath restored <S%H7725><s%> to the debtor <S%H2326><s%> his pledge, <S%H2258><s%> hath spoiled <S%H1497><s%> none <S%H3808><s%> by violence, <S%H1500><s%> hath given <S%H5414><s%> his bread <S%H3899><s%> to the hungry, <S%H7457><s%> and hath covered <S%H3680><s%> the naked <S%H5903><s%> with a garment; <S%H899><s%>

He that hath not <S%H3808><s%> given forth <S%H5414><s%> upon usury, <S%H5392><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> hath taken <S%H3947><s%> any increase, <S%H8636><s%> that hath withdrawn <S%H7725><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> from iniquity, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5766><s%> hath executed <S%H6213><s%> true <S%H571><s%> judgment <S%H4941><s%> between <S%H996><s%> man <S%H376><s%> and man, <S%H376><s%>

Hath walked <S%H1980><s%> in my statutes, <S%H2708><s%> and hath kept <S%H8104><s%> my judgments, <S%H4941><s%> to deal <S%H6213><s%> truly; <S%H571><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> is just, <S%H6662><s%> he shall surely live, <S%H2421><s%> <S%H2421><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%>

If he beget <S%H3205><s%> a son <S%H1121><s%> that is a robber, <S%H6530><s%> a shedder <S%H8210><s%> of blood, <S%H1818><s%> and that doeth <S%H6213><s%> the like <S%H251><s%> to any one <S%H4480><s%> <S%H259><s%> of these <S%H4480><s%> <S%H428><s%> things,

And that <S%H1931><s%> doeth <S%H6213><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> <S%H853><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> of those <S%H428><s%> duties, but <S%H3588><s%> even <S%H1571><s%> hath eaten <S%H398><s%> upon <S%H413><s%> the mountains, <S%H2022><s%> and defiled <S%H2930><s%> his neighbor's <S%H7453><s%> wife, <S%H802><s%>

Hath oppressed <S%H3238><s%> the poor <S%H6041><s%> and needy, <S%H34><s%> hath spoiled <S%H1497><s%> by violence, <S%H1500><s%> hath not <S%H3808><s%> restored <S%H7725><s%> the pledge, <S%H2258><s%> and hath lifted up <S%H5375><s%> his eyes <S%H5869><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the idols, <S%H1544><s%> hath committed <S%H6213><s%> abomination, <S%H8441><s%>

Hath given forth <S%H5414><s%> upon usury, <S%H5392><s%> and hath taken <S%H3947><s%> increase: <S%H8636><s%> shall he then live? <S%H2421><s%> he shall not <S%H3808><s%> live: <S%H2421><s%> he hath done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> abominations; <S%H8441><s%> he shall surely die; <S%H4191><s%> <S%H4191><s%> his blood <S%H1818><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> upon him.

Now, lo, <S%H2009><s%> if he beget <S%H3205><s%> a son, <S%H1121><s%> that seeth <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> his father's <S%H1><s%> sins <S%H2403><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he hath done, <S%H6213><s%> and considereth, <S%H7200><s%> and doeth <S%H6213><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> such like,

That hath not <S%H3808><s%> eaten <S%H398><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the mountains, <S%H2022><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> hath lifted up <S%H5375><s%> his eyes <S%H5869><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the idols <S%H1544><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> hath not <S%H3808><s%> defiled <S%H2930><s%> his neighbor's <S%H7453><s%> <S%H853><s%> wife, <S%H802><s%>

Neither <S%H3808><s%> hath oppressed <S%H3238><s%> any, <S%H376><s%> hath not <S%H3808><s%> withheld <S%H2254><s%> the pledge, <S%H2258><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> hath spoiled <S%H1497><s%> by violence, <S%H1500><s%> but hath given <S%H5414><s%> his bread <S%H3899><s%> to the hungry, <S%H7457><s%> and hath covered <S%H3680><s%> the naked <S%H5903><s%> with a garment, <S%H899><s%>

That hath taken off <S%H7725><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> from the poor, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6041><s%> that hath not <S%H3808><s%> received <S%H3947><s%> usury <S%H5392><s%> nor increase, <S%H8636><s%> hath executed <S%H6213><s%> my judgments, <S%H4941><s%> hath walked <S%H1980><s%> in my statutes; <S%H2708><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> die <S%H4191><s%> for the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of his father, <S%H1><s%> he shall surely live. <S%H2421><s%> <S%H2421><s%>

As for his father, <S%H1><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> he cruelly oppressed, <S%H6231><s%> <S%H6233><s%> spoiled <S%H1497><s%> his brother <S%H251><s%> by violence, <S%H1499><s%> and did <S%H6213><s%> that which <S%H834><s%> is not <S%H3808><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> his people, <S%H5971><s%> lo, <S%H2009><s%> even he shall die <S%H4191><s%> in his iniquity. <S%H5771><s%>

Yet say <S%H559><s%> ye, Why? <S%H4069><s%> doth not <S%H3808><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> bear <S%H5375><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the father? <S%H1><s%> When the son <S%H1121><s%> hath done <S%H6213><s%> that which is lawful <S%H4941><s%> and right, <S%H6666><s%> and hath kept <S%H8104><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> my statutes, <S%H2708><s%> and hath done <S%H6213><s%> them, he shall surely live. <S%H2421><s%> <S%H2421><s%>

The soul <S%H5315><s%> that sinneth, <S%H2398><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> shall die. <S%H4191><s%> The son <S%H1121><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> bear <S%H5375><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the father, <S%H1><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall the father <S%H1><s%> bear <S%H5375><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the son: <S%H1121><s%> the righteousness <S%H6666><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> him, and the wickedness <S%H7564><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> him.

But if <S%H3588><s%> the wicked <S%H7563><s%> will turn <S%H7725><s%> from all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> his sins <S%H2403><s%> that <S%H834><s%> he hath committed, <S%H6213><s%> and keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> my statutes, <S%H2708><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> that which is lawful <S%H4941><s%> and right, <S%H6666><s%> he shall surely live, <S%H2421><s%> <S%H2421><s%> he shall not <S%H3808><s%> die. <S%H4191><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> his transgressions <S%H6588><s%> that <S%H834><s%> he hath committed, <S%H6213><s%> they shall not <S%H3808><s%> be mentioned <S%H2142><s%> unto him: in his righteousness <S%H6666><s%> that <S%H834><s%> he hath done <S%H6213><s%> he shall live. <S%H2421><s%>

Have I any pleasure at all <S%H2654><s%> <S%H2654><s%> that the wicked <S%H7563><s%> should die? <S%H4194><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD: <S%H3069><s%> and not <S%H3808><s%> that he should return <S%H7725><s%> from his ways, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1870><s%> and live? <S%H2421><s%>

But when the righteous <S%H6662><s%> turneth away <S%H7725><s%> from his righteousness, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6666><s%> and committeth <S%H6213><s%> iniquity, <S%H5766><s%> and doeth <S%H6213><s%> according to all <S%H3605><s%> the abominations <S%H8441><s%> that <S%H834><s%> the wicked <S%H7563><s%> man doeth, <S%H6213><s%> shall he live? <S%H2421><s%> All <S%H3605><s%> his righteousness <S%H6666><s%> that <S%H834><s%> he hath done <S%H6213><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> be mentioned: <S%H2142><s%> in his trespass <S%H4604><s%> that <S%H834><s%> he hath trespassed, <S%H4603><s%> and in his sin <S%H2403><s%> that <S%H834><s%> he hath sinned, <S%H2398><s%> in them shall he die. <S%H4191><s%>

Yet ye say, <S%H559><s%> The way <S%H1870><s%> of the Lord <S%H136><s%> is not equal. <S%H8505><s%> <S%H3808><s%> Hear <S%H8085><s%> now, <S%H4994><s%> O house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> Is not <S%H3808><s%> my way <S%H1870><s%> equal? <S%H8505><s%> are not <S%H3808><s%> your ways <S%H1870><s%> unequal? <S%H3808><s%> <S%H8505><s%>

When a righteous <S%H6662><s%> man turneth away <S%H7725><s%> from his righteousness, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6666><s%> and committeth <S%H6213><s%> iniquity, <S%H5766><s%> and dieth <S%H4191><s%> in <S%H5921><s%> them; for his iniquity <S%H5766><s%> that <S%H834><s%> he hath done <S%H6213><s%> shall he die. <S%H4191><s%>

Again, when the wicked <S%H7563><s%> man turneth away <S%H7725><s%> from his wickedness <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7564><s%> that <S%H834><s%> he hath committed, <S%H6213><s%> and doeth <S%H6213><s%> that which is lawful <S%H4941><s%> and right, <S%H6666><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> shall save his soul alive. <S%H2421><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5315><s%>

Because he considereth, <S%H7200><s%> and turneth away <S%H7725><s%> from all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> his transgressions <S%H6588><s%> that <S%H834><s%> he hath committed, <S%H6213><s%> he shall surely live, <S%H2421><s%> <S%H2421><s%> he shall not <S%H3808><s%> die. <S%H4191><s%>

Yet saith <S%H559><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> The way <S%H1870><s%> of the Lord <S%H136><s%> is not equal. <S%H8505><s%> <S%H3808><s%> O house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> are not <S%H3808><s%> my ways <S%H1870><s%> equal? <S%H8505><s%> are not <S%H3808><s%> your ways <S%H1870><s%> unequal? <S%H3808><s%> <S%H8505><s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> I will judge <S%H8199><s%> you, O house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> every one <S%H376><s%> according to his ways, <S%H1870><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%> Repent, <S%H7725><s%> and turn <S%H7725><s%> yourselves from all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> your transgressions; <S%H6588><s%> so iniquity <S%H5771><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> be <S%H1961><s%> your ruin. <S%H4383><s%>

Cast away <S%H7993><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> you <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> your transgressions, <S%H6588><s%> whereby <S%H834><s%> ye have transgressed; <S%H6586><s%> and make <S%H6213><s%> you a new <S%H2319><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%> and a new <S%H2319><s%> spirit: <S%H7307><s%> for why <S%H4100><s%> will ye die, <S%H4191><s%> O house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel? <S%H3478><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> I have no pleasure <S%H2654><s%> <S%H3808><s%> in the death <S%H4194><s%> of him that dieth, <S%H4191><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD: <S%H3069><s%> wherefore turn <S%H7725><s%> yourselves, and live <S%H2421><s%> ye.
